title: FumeFx 1.0a X64 for 3DsMax 2008 X64
description:
This is FumeFX 1.0a For 3DsMax 2008.

Latest version of FumeFX and works Perfectly.. That is once you\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\&#039;ve mastered it ;)


*Install FumeFX To your 3DsMax Root directory as directed in the installer along with the DCPFlics files.

*Run 3DsMax 2008 and attempt to use the FumeFX creation tool in Creation Rollout.

*You\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\&#039;ll be greated with a screen saying you\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\&#039;ll need to register. Selection \\\\\\\\\\\\\\\"Authorize\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\" A new window will popup. Select Activate manually. Type in a random serial number since it\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\&#039;s totally pointless. 

*Then Run the turbosquidkg.exe KeyGen and punch in the code it tells you on the window before into the User ID box on the keygen. Then copy and paste the \\\\\\\\\\\\\\\"FumeFX 1.0 Authorize ID\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\" that it spit out into the Keygen into the Bar bellow where you put the serial number on the manual Authorize screen.

*And that\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\&#039;s it! Shall be  working 100%

!!!Ah yes.. and here\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\&#039;s a known Bug that I get while using FumeFx. If you try to change something in the FumeFx Tabs and then keeps dissapearing.. Just edit it through to modifier  tab instead. Shall work just fine that way.!!!

***********************************************************

Or just use one of our IRC portals located at http://pspcube.com/irc

My nick on there is \\\\\\\\\\\\\\\"Nex\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\" So if i\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\&#039;m not there then just wait or come back later and I should be there. :)

Cheers!
